BGP_NEIGHBOR_NEG_INVALID_ENFORCE_FIRST_A.desc: Invalid boolean value for enforce first AS.

BGP_NEIGHBOR_AF_NEG_INVALID_NAME.desc: Incorrect neighbor name in neighbor AF.

BGP_NEIGHBOR_AF_NEG_INVALID_MAXTHRESHOLD.desc: Invalid maximum prefix warning threshold in neighbor AF.

BGP_NEIGHBOR_AF_NEG_INVALID_SOFT_RECFG_I.desc: Invalid boolean value for soft reconfiguration-in in neighbor AF.

BGP_NEIGHBOR_AF_NEG_INVALID_SEND_COMNTY.desc: Invalid value for send community type in neighbor AF.

BGP_PEER_GROUP_AF_NEG_PEER_GROUP_NOT_EXI.desc: Referring non-existing BGP peer group table.

BGP_PEERGROUP_INVALID_ENFORCE_FIRST_AS.desc: Invalid boolean value for enforce first AS.

BGP_PEERGROUP_AF_INVALID_MAXTHRESHOLD.desc: Invalid maximum prefix warning threshold in peergroup AF.

BGP_PEERGROUP_AF_INVALID_SOFT_RECFG_IN.desc: Invalid boolean value for soft reconfiguration-in in peergroup AF.

BGP_PEERGROUP_AF_INVALID_SEND_COMNTY.desc: Invalid value for send community type in peergroup AF.

BGP_PEERGROUP_AF_ROUTE_MAP_NOT_EXIST.desc: Missing or non-existent route-map reference in peergroup AF.

BGP_NEIGHBOR_AF_NEG_INVALID_MAP_IN.desc: Invalid route-map in count in neighbor AF.

BGP_NEIGHBOR_AF_NEG_INVALID_MAP_OUT.desc: Invalid route-map out count in neighbor AF.

BGP_PEERGROUP_AF_NEG_INVALID_MAP_IN.desc: Invalid route-map in count in peergroup AF.

BGP_PEERGROUP_AF_NEG_INVALID_MAP_OUT.desc: Invalid route-map out count in peergroup AF.

BGP_NEIGHBOR_NEG_INVALID_HOPS.desc: Invalid TTL hops for unnumbered interface neigbhor.
